{{cpp/container/mdspan/title|static_extent}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|
static constexpr std::size_t static_extent( rank_type r ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Statically determines the extent of a {{tt|mdspan}} at the rank index {{c|r}}. If the rank index {{c|r}} corresponds to a dynamic extent, returns {{lc|std::dynamic_extent}}. Equivalent to {{c|return Extents::static_extent(r);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|r|The rank index to get the static extent size of}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The static extent size, or {{lc|std::dynamic_extent}}.
